title: Rank 6 & 7
body:
Whats the news with the rank 6 and 7 for champion masteries?
Its been a few months since they showed the rank 6 & 7 animations.

replies.body:
What is the point of ranks? It doesn't actually show how good you are, it just shows how much time you have spent on a particular champion.

The ranks need to go up and down based on how good you play said champion.
When season 6 starts, with the Hextech crafting, etc
